Control.name: Sys_User
Control.label: SysUser:
Control.reference: SELECT @user

Control.name: Sys_Date
Control.label: SysDate:
Control.reference: SELECT @dtlNow

Control.name: Year_Now
Control.label: Actual year:
Control.reference: SELECT CAST(strftime('%Y',@1) AS INTEGER)

Control.name: Answer_Timestamp
Control.label: Answer Timestamp:
Control.reference: SELECT DISTINCT timestamp FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @1 AND question_id = @2

Control.name: User_status
Control.label: User státusz:
Control.reference: SELECT status_id FROM Reference_hv_user WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @1

Control.name: Period_Finish
Control.label: Period finish:
Control.reference: SELECT period_finish FROM Reference_hv_user WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @1

Control.name: Category_Count
Control.label: Aktualis kategória count:
Control.reference: SELECT COUNT(type) FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE type = @1

Control.name: SleepDiary_Count
Control.label: SleepDiary countja:
Control.reference: SELECT COUNT(type) FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE type = 'Sleep Diary'

Control.name: VAS_Count
Control.label: VAS countja:
Control.reference: SELECT COUNT(type) FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE type = 'VAS'

Control.name: VAS_SleepDiary_Count
Control.label: VAS + SleepDiary countja:
Control.reference: SELECT @1 + @2

Control.name: VAS_GoToSleep_Count
Control.label: VAS + GoToSleep countja:
Control.reference: SELECT @1 + 1

Control.name: First_VAS
Control.label: Első VAS kérdés idja:
Control.reference: SELECT MIN(question_id) FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE type = 'VAS'

Control.name: Question_Count
Control.label: Megválaszolt kérdések száma:
Control.reference: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ATP.question_id) FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp ATP INNER JOIN Reference_hv_questions Q ON ATP.question_id = Q.question_id WHERE ATP.subject_id = @1 AND ATP.usr = @user AND ATP.answer IS NOT NULL AND ATP.answer != ''

Control.name: VAS_Sleep_Question_Count
Control.label: Megválaszolt VAS és Sleepek száma:
Control.reference: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ATP.question_id) FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp ATP INNER JOIN Reference_hv_questions Q ON ATP.question_id = Q.question_id WHERE (Q.type = 'VAS' OR Q.type = 'Sleep Diary' ) AND ATP.subject_id = @1 AND ATP.usr = @user AND ATP.answer IS NOT NULL AND ATP.answer != ''

Control.name: GotToSleepVasCategory_Count
Control.label: Megválaszolt VAS és GoToSleepek száma:
Control.reference: SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ATP.question_id) + 1 FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp ATP INNER JOIN Reference_hv_questions Q ON ATP.question_id = Q.question_id WHERE (Q.type = 'VAS' OR Q.type = 'Sleep Diary' ) AND ATP.subject_id = @1 AND ATP.usr = @user AND ATP.answer IS NOT NULL AND ATP.answer != ''

Control.name: Category_Count_Percent
Control.label: Százalék:
Control.reference: SELECT ROUND(ROUND(@1 * 1.0 / @2 ,2)*100,0)

Control.name: Category_Count_SleepVAS_Percent
Control.label: Százalék VAS Sleep:
Control.reference: SELECT ROUND(ROUND(@1 * 1.0 / @2 ,2)*100,0)

Control.name: Category_Count_GoToSleepVAS_Percent
Control.label: Százalék VAS GoToSleep:
Control.reference: SELECT ROUND(ROUND(@1 * 1.0 / @2 ,2)*100,0)

Control.name: Question_Id
Control.label: Question id:
Control.reference: SELECT question_id FROM Reference_hv_next_form_temp WHERE usr = @user

Control.name: Question_sequence
Control.label: Question sequence:
Control.reference: SELECT question_sequence FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Category_Id
Control.label: Category id:
Control.reference: SELECT category_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Category_Type
Control.label: Category type:
Control.reference: SELECT type FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: SubjectID
Control.label: Subject_ID:
Control.reference: SELECT subject_id FROM Reference_hv_user WHERE usr = @user AND status_id < 60

Control.name: Category_Forward_Type
Control.label: Category forward type:
Control.reference: SELECT type FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Category_Back_Id
Control.label: Category back id:
Control.reference: SELECT category_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Question_Back_Id
Control.label: back question_id:
Control.reference: SELECT question_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_sequence < @1 ORDER BY question_sequence DESC LIMIT 1

Control.name: Question_Forward_Id
Control.label: forward question_id:
Control.reference: SELECT question_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_sequence > @1 ORDER BY question_sequence LIMIT 1

Control.name: Category_Forward_Id
Control.label: Category forward id:
Control.reference: SELECT category_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Period_Info_P
Control.generator: SELECT period_info FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1 AND period_info IS NOT NULL AND period_info != ''

Control.name: Period_Info
Control.reference: SELECT @1

Control.name: Answer_Content_Id
Control.label: Answer content id:
Control.reference: SELECT answer_content_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Answer_Control_Type
Control.label: Answer control type:
Control.reference: SELECT control_type FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Scale_Desc_Content_Id
Control.label: Scale desc content id:
Control.reference: SELECT scale_description_content_id FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Scale_Desc_Column_Amount
Control.label: Scale desc column amount:
Control.reference: SELECT scale_description_column_amount FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Question
Control.reference: SELECT question FROM Reference_hv_questions WHERE question_id = @1

Control.name: Checkbox_Answer_T_P
Control.generator: SELECT id, answer, answer_key FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @1 ORDER BY answer_key

Control.name: Is_Checked
Control.reference: SELECT 'true' FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @3 AND question_id = @1 AND is_checked = 1 AND answer = @2

Control.name: Checkbox_Answer_Id
Control.reference: SELECT @1

Control.name: Checkbox_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT @1

Control.name: Checkbox_Answer_Key
Control.reference: SELECT @1

Control.name: Comment_P
Control.generator: SELECT comment_label FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE id = @1 AND is_comment = 1 AND @2 = 1

Control.name: Comment
Control.reference: SELECT other FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND question_id = @1 AND subject_id = @2 AND answer = @3

Control.reference: SELECT MIN(Id) FROM Reference_hv_scale_descriptions WHERE content_id = @1

Control.name: Scale_Desc_1_Text
Control.reference: SELECT description FROM Reference_hv_scale_descriptions WHERE id = @1

Control.name: Dotted_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT id, answer FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @1
Control.value_reference: SELECT answer FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE question_id = @1 AND usr = @user AND subject_id = @2

Control.name: mivan
Control.label: mi van kiválasztva?
Control.reference: SELECT A.answer FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp AS AT INNER JOIN Reference_hv_answers AS A ON A.id = AT.answer WHERE AT.question_id = @1 AND AT.usr = @user AND AT.subject_id = @2

Control.name: Dotted_IsExist
Control.label: van e rá válasz?
Control.reference: SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(@1 , 1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @1 != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Control.reference: SELECT MIN(Id) FROM Reference_hv_scale_descriptions WHERE content_id = @1

Control.name: Scale_Desc_1_Text

Control.name: Dotted_Answer_Key
Control.label: Dotted answer key:
Control.reference: SELECT answer_key FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE id = @1

Control.name: Radio_Answer
Control.value_reference: SELECT answer FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE question_id = @1 AND usr = @user AND subject_id = @2
Control.reference: SELECT id, answer FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @1

Control.name: Radio_IsExist
Control.label: van e rá válasz?
Control.reference: SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(@1 , 1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @1 != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Control.name: Radio_Answer_Key
Control.label: Radio answer key:
Control.reference: SELECT answer_key FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE id = @1

Control.name: Simple_Combobox_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT id, answer FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @1 AND (answer + 0 <= @2 OR LENGTH(TRIM(answer,'0123456789')) != 0)
Control.value_reference: SELECT answer FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1 UNION ALL SELECT t.answer FROM (SELECT answer FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @3 ORDER BY content_id LIMIT 1) t LIMIT 1

Control.name: Simple_Combobox_IsExist
Control.label: van e rá válasz?
Control.reference: SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(@1 , 1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @1 != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Control.name: Hour_Combobox_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT id, answer FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @1
Control.value_reference: SELECT SUBSTR(answer,1,2) FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1 UNION ALL SELECT '00' answer LIMIT 1

Control.name: Minute_Combobox_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT id, answer FROM Reference_hv_answers WHERE content_id = @1
Control.value_reference: SELECT SUBSTR(answer,4,2) FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1 UNION ALL SELECT '00' answer LIMIT 1

Control.name: Time_Combobox_IsExist
Control.label: van e rá válasz?
Control.reference: SELECT CASE WHEN SUBSTR(@1,1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @1 != '' AND SUBSTR(@2,1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @2 != '' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END

Control.name: Text_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT answer FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1

Control.name: Number_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT answer FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1

Control.name: Date_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT DATETIME(answer) FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1

Control.name: TimePicker_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN DATETIME(@dtlNow , 'start of day') ELSE DATETIME(STRFTIME('%Y-%m-%d ', @dtlNow ) || SUBSTR(answer, 12, 5)) END FROM Reference_hv_answer_temp WHERE usr = @user AND subject_id = @2 AND question_id = @1

Control.name: Time_Answer
Control.label: Time_Answer
Control.reference: SELECT STRFTIME('%m-%d-%Y ', @dtlNow ) || STRFTIME('%H:%M', @1 )

Control.name: checkboxseged
Control.label: CHECKBOX
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.name: dottedseged
Control.label: DOTTED
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.label: RADIO
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.label: NUMBER
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.label: TEXTBOX
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.label: DATE
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.name: timeseged
Control.label: TIME
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.name: simple_combo_seged
Control.label: SimpleCombo
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.name: time_combo_seged
Control.label: TimeCombo
Control.reference: SELECT SUBSTR(@1,1,7)

Control.name: textisnull
Control.label: text default value:
Control.reference: SELECT 'ures' WHERE @1=''

Control.name: textvaluelabel
Control.label: text value:
Control.reference: SELECT 'ures' WHERE @1 = ''

Control.name: kiiras2
Control.label: actionforward?
Control.reference: SELECT '1' WHERE @1 != 1 AND @2 != 1 OR @3 = 0

Control.name: forward_actions
Control.label: kötelező?
Control.reference: SELECT '1' WHERE @1 = '1' OR @2 = 1

Control.name: AnswerValidator
Control.label: AnswerValidator
Control.reference: SELECT CASE WHEN (@1 != 0 AND SUBSTR(@1,1,7) != '__NULL_') OR (@2 != 0 AND SUBSTR(@2,1,7) != '__NULL_') OR (@3 != 0 AND SUBSTR(@3,1,7) != '__NULL_') OR (SUBSTR(@4,1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @4 != '') OR (SUBSTR(@5,1,7) != '__NULL_' AND @5 != '') OR (SUBSTR(@6,1,7) != '__NULL_') OR (SUBSTR(@7,1,7) != '__NULL_' ) OR (@8 != 0 AND SUBSTR(@8,1,7) != '__NULL_') OR (@9 != 0 AND SUBSTR(@9,1,7) != '__NULL_') THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END

Control.name: ProgressBar
Control.sylnCrown: SELECT CASE WHEN @1 BETWEEN 0 AND 4 THEN 'PB00Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 5 AND 9 THEN 'PB05Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN 'PB10Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN 'PB15Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN 'PB20Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN 'PB25Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN 'PB30Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN 'PB35Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN 'PB40Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN 'PB45Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN 'PB50Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN 'PB55Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN 'PB60Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN 'PB65Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN 'PB70Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN 'PB75Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 80 AND 84 THEN 'PB80Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 85 AND 89 THEN 'PB85Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 90 AND 94 THEN 'PB90Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 95 AND 98 THEN 'PB95Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 99 AND 100 THEN 'PB100Syl' ELSE 'PB00Syl' END

Control.name: ProgressBar
Control.sylnCrown: SELECT CASE WHEN @1 BETWEEN 0 AND 4 THEN 'PB00Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 5 AND 9 THEN 'PB05Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN 'PB10Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN 'PB15Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN 'PB20Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN 'PB25Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN 'PB30Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN 'PB35Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN 'PB40Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN 'PB45Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN 'PB50Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN 'PB55Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN 'PB60Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN 'PB65Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN 'PB70Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN 'PB75Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 80 AND 84 THEN 'PB80Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 85 AND 89 THEN 'PB85Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 90 AND 94 THEN 'PB90Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 95 AND 98 THEN 'PB95Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 99 AND 100 THEN 'PB100Syl' ELSE 'PB00Syl' END

Control.name: ProgressBar
Control.sylnCrown: SELECT CASE WHEN @1 BETWEEN 0 AND 4 THEN 'PB00Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 5 AND 9 THEN 'PB05Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 10 AND 14 THEN 'PB10Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 15 AND 19 THEN 'PB15Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 20 AND 24 THEN 'PB20Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 25 AND 29 THEN 'PB25Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 30 AND 34 THEN 'PB30Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 35 AND 39 THEN 'PB35Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 40 AND 44 THEN 'PB40Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 45 AND 49 THEN 'PB45Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 50 AND 54 THEN 'PB50Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 55 AND 59 THEN 'PB55Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 60 AND 64 THEN 'PB60Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 65 AND 69 THEN 'PB65Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 70 AND 74 THEN 'PB70Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 75 AND 79 THEN 'PB75Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 80 AND 84 THEN 'PB80Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 85 AND 89 THEN 'PB85Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 90 AND 94 THEN 'PB90Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 95 AND 98 THEN 'PB95Syl' WHEN @1 BETWEEN 99 AND 100 THEN 'PB100Syl' ELSE 'PB00Syl' END
